price: 158. Mpe topesaki bango etumbu, wana ezali elembo kasi ebele na bango bazalaki kondima te.
arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
